channel.title: Congratulations
channel.description: Hello I am new to this forum. sorry, I was wrong to put this issue. I am very happy with the work they have done in Black Mesa I hope soon to hear from Blue Shift and opponsing force. I was playing half life since 12. Congratulations for the early access (steam) :slight_smile:

item.title: Congratulations
item.dc:creator: Sybill
item.description:
Hello I am new to this forum. sorry, I was wrong to put this issue.
I am very happy with the work they have done in Black Mesa
I hope soon to hear from Blue Shift and opponsing force. I was playing half life since 12.
Congratulations for the early access (steam)
